what-it-does: Checks for the use of extraneous whitespace after "(", "[" or "{".
why-is-this-bad:
PEP 8 recommends the omission of whitespace in the following cases:



"Immediately inside parentheses, brackets or braces."
"Immediately before a comma, semicolon, or colon."
example:
spam( ham[1], {eggs: 2})
spam(ham[ 1], {eggs: 2})
spam(ham[1], { eggs: 2})



Use instead:


spam(ham[1], {eggs: 2})
